name: Kaoru Sayama
description:
Kaoru Sayama from the video game yakuza kiwami 2. Trained on 20+ images with chilloutmix. Works well with realistic & semi realistic asian based models.


Tested on chilloutmix, ddosmix, chikmix, neverending dream and a few others.

Works very poorly on standard SD, deliberate, and other general purpose models.

I recommend putting 3d, render, cartoon in the negative prompt or you get a crappy polygon person in some models.

meta.prompt: (high quality, best quality), highly detailed, photo of beautiful kaoru_sayama-4000, updo hair, photorealistic
meta.negativePrompt: EasyNegative, missing fingers, extra fingers, signature, watermark, username, 3d, render, cartoon

meta.prompt: (8k, RAW photo, best quality, masterpiece:1.2), (realistic, photo-realistic:1.37), portrait photo of kaoru_sayama-4000, updo hair, 1girl, professional lighting, photon mapping, radiosity, physically-based rendering, blush, necklace, earrings, exquisite makeup
meta.negativePrompt: EasyNegative, missing fingers, extra fingers, signature, watermark, username, EasyNegative, paintings, sketches, (worst quality:2), (low quality:2), (normal quality:2), lowres, normal quality, ((monochrome)), ((grayscale)), skin spots, acnes, skin blemishes, age spot, glans, ((strange fingers)),((bad hand)), ((Three arms)), ((extra fingers)),((watermark:2)),((white letters:1)), ((wrong hands)), ((fewer fingers)),((deformed fingers)),((not complete finger))
